mapper.insert: insert into yuhan_homework_data_table (YUHAN_HOMEWORK_DATA_HOMEWORK_NUMBER, YUHAN_HOMEWORK_DATA_NAME, YUHAN_HOMEWORK_DATA_SIZE, YUHAN_HOMEWORK_DATA_URL, YUHAN_PROFESSOR_NUMBER, YUHAN_SUBJECT_NUMBER) values (#{HomeWorkNO}, #{FileName}, #{FileSize}, #{FileSaveUrl}, #{professorNo}, #{subjectID})
mapper.select: select * from yuhan_homework_data_table where YUHAN_HOMEWORK_DATA_HOMEWORK_NUMBER = #{subjectID} and YUHAN_HOMEWORK_NUMBER = #{hwno}
